subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Lidstrom, 41, will return for a 20th season with the Detroit Red Wings. He agreed to a one-year deal worth $6.2 million, the same as last season.
snippet: Nicklas Lidstrom, 41, will return for a 20th season with the Detroit Red Wings. He agreed to a one-year deal worth $6.2 million, the same as last season.
